# InstaPy2
Automation script for Instagram that *farms* comments, follows and likes.

## INSTAPY2 DOES NOT SUPPORT 2FA IN ITS CURRENT STATE AND USING IT WITH 2FA MAY RESULT IN A FLAGGED ACCOUNT OR BAN.
## 2FA WILL ONLY BE RELEASED AFTER EXTENSIVE TESTING.
### SEE BRANCH `2fa-features` FOR PROGRESS.
